title: Citizen and Stakeholder Perspectives About Approaches to Enhance Equitable Access to Assistive Technologies for Older Adults.
abstract: Assistive technologies play an important role in promoting healthy aging, independent living and aging-in-place, yet many experience unmet needs. This project reports on three citizen panels and a stakeholder dialogue convened in Canada to spark action towards enhancing equitable access to assistive technologies for older adults.
